channel.title: How to get Auto-Updater to work?
channel.description:
Well I followed Project Evolutions [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,435716.0.html] guide[/url] for the Auto-Updater and I can't seem to get my run to work when I put [code]java -noverify -javaagent:"C:\Program Files\ZeroTurnaround\JRebel" server[/code] in it.
Here is my current Run.bat file: [code]@echo off color 0a title Over The Edge java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
Does anyone know how I can get that tutorial to work with my run.bat?
